problem.markdown:
What is the minimum width, minimum spacing rule of same potential and different potential Well ? () 10,9 and 10,6. (x) 10,6 and 10,9. () 10,10 and 9,6. () 10,9 and 10,9.
Transistor gate form when two layers overlap. These two layers are - () Polysilicon and Select. () Polysilicon and Contact. () Polysilicon and Metal. (x) Polysilicon and Active.
The layout design rules are usually described by - () Separation rule. () Distance Rule. (x) Micron rule and Design Rule. () Micron Rule.
Lambda is known as - () sepaparation of layers. (x) minimum feature size. () distance of pixel. () all of these.
The Length and width of a transistor are two most important dimensions of transistors that depend on - () drain dimentions. (x) gate dimention. () bulk dimention. () source dimention.
Which of these are wrong option regarding design rule - a. Width rule b. space rule c. Overlap rule d. pixel rule.
() a, b, c, and d. () b and d. () a and b. (x) a, b, and c.
Minimum spacing rule of metal layer is - () 3 mm. (x) 3 lamada. () 6 lamada. () 10 lamada.
DRC means - () Direct Rule Check. (x) Design Rule Check. () Design Right Check. () Direct Right Check.
Overlapping is allowed in layers : (x) Poly and Metal. () Metal 1 and Metal 2. () Active and Poly. () All Of These.
problem.p: What is the minimum width, minimum spacing rule of same potential and different potential Well ?
